reviews.review_msg: Hard exams if you are not good at math

Great lecturer, knows what shes talking about, and the exams or very easy. Everything on the exam is expected and she provided you with many examples to practice with. Definitely take BUS 316 with her!
Excellent prof! Very knowledgeable and he explains concepts/theories very well. Although his class is tough... I have learned so much from his class!

He's not easy, so expect that going in. HOWEVER, if you want to do well in future finance courses, I highly recommend taking Jorge's class. He goes over concepts that others don't, such as swaps, and fully prepares you for 400 level courses. After taking his class, the 400 level stuff I did was simple since I had done it already over and over.

Before I write the final exam, I just want to say he is actually a good prof. Yes his assignments are way tougher than other profs' but they are doable and you learn a lot from them. In the long run you will be thankful to be taught by him...and this is apparently his last term teaching.. what a shame..
Loved his stories, his analogies helped to explain complex financial models. Great course/great prof.

Very smar guy. He focuses on practical stuff so I liked the course. The course website could be improved, but he has clear rules and expectations since the begining. I wish he had more office hours, especially before the lecture! Overall a good prof!

Take home assignment is too long and hard!he is always late for class.He cannot finish his tasks on time and he hardly replyed our emails.His office hour is right after class (most time b4 he post the assignment problems).He always sends emails at midnight.

most disorganized prof ive seen. typo in everything. late at least 10min EVERY SINGLE CLASS. posts assn late and expect u to finish it on time. he thinks his class is the only class students hav. tak home midterm is ridiculous. extremely time consuming, more thn inclass mt. hes full of himself. too much wkload.4assn,1tak home mt, 1 inclass mt,final
don't take any courses with him unless you love low GPA. materials are not enough to do assignments and exams

He is an excelent prof, with a laid back personality and a sense of humor. He explains very well and makes the class interesting, which helps when you're studying some boring topics. He makes you work hard, but you learn A LOT! and his marking is very fair. From my experience with other finance profs, I can say that I'm glad to have Jorge for 316.

He is very hard.  He makes you work hard, there are 4 assign, 1 take home midterm, 1 in class midterm and a final. He is very smart so he expects his students to be as smart as him.  He doesn't have much office hours.  Worst of all he keeps taking about drinkin and smokin all kind of stuff. He procrastinates all the time and hes full of himself.

Excellent prof! Explains clearly, easy to understand, slides make sense. Assignments are okay, take home midterm is very hard, but you know the material very well after you take it with him. Finance majors: take it with him --> prepares you for 400 level. He's quite funny and lectures aren't boring at all. He's also very fair.

He is very hard in the sense that he really wants you to learn your stuff and not just memorize. You have to put in some hours for any of the courses that you take with him, but at the end its worth it.  He is patient and knows his material very well.  One recommendation do not take Bus 315 and Bus 316 at the same time. YOU WILL DIE.

Awesome instructor! One of the best I have ever had. He is hard but very fair. In all honesty, I didn't even find the course hard, just I need to put some hours into it, like all other finance courses. Also, if he were a little taller, I will totally hit on him....

Amazing lecturer. Always prepared and enthusiastic. Course is not easy, but you actually learn something. During office hours, it's often hard to keep up with his pace but if you ask he repeats himself with patience. He's not much older than us students so he understands where we're coming from. Highly recommended.

I strongly recommend students takimg Bus 316 with Prof. Jorge Cruz Lopez. He teaches his students with great enthusiasm and charisma. Although this couse is not an easy one, you will definitely gain useful knowledge by the end of the course.

Excellent prof! He's passionate about derivatives and succeeds in making the lectures very interesting. I have never seen a prof that is so eager to help students. If you consistently work hard in his class, you can do very well. His lecture material is VERY IMPORTANT for his exams. He makes the class quite challenging but you learn a lot!!!

This instructor is very good. He knows a lot about finance and he is willing to help you all the time. He has an accent, but you can understand everything. The first midterm was hard, but his grading is ok. Overall the class is easy if you read the notes and go to the lectures.

This prof is great!. He's young and funny, and makes things very clear. Midterms are hard but he gives lots of part marks. Some things in bus316 class are very hard, but he will try to explain in many different ways so that students can understand. He will help you with questions if you see him even if he is not in office hours.
